title: Be brave, the universe has your back
summary: The universe conspires when one really wants something, they say. Even more when one stands for the oppressed, Valluvar adds. Listen to this week’s episode to learn about the extraordinary story of Billie Jean King and a match that changed the future of women’s sports and the fight for gender equality as a whole.

title: 5 stocks where likely growth & management make them worth holding for 5 Diwalis
summary: Every year, the street is bombarded with ‘Diwali picks’. The fact is that whether it is Diwali, New Year or any other so-called auspicious occasion, stocks cannot be bought because of a particular day. They have to be bought because there are fundamental changes happening in the industry. Most importantly, they have to be kept for the long term to create wealth. In the next five years, there are sectors where government spending and policy changes will have an impact — both on companies and us as consumers and savers
